Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:45% Hemolysis=16 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=13.12 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:IC50=13.33 µg/ml,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:IC50=11.695±1.549 µg/ml,Vero cells:IC50=17.673±4.447 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans(MIC=3.31µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MIC=3.41µg/ml),Candida krusei(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida glabrata(MIC=3.31µg/ml),Candida haemulonii(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=4-16µg/ml),Candida auris(MIC=3.48µg/ml),Candida viswanathii(MIC=2µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii(MIC=2.83µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. gattii(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida auris NCCPF 470067(MIC=2µg/ml),Candida haemulonii ATCC 22991(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida krusei NCCPF 440022(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida glabrata ATCC 2001(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NCCPF 450033(MIC=4µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=34.4µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=23.18µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC80=8µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NCCPF 450033(MIC80=16µg/ml),Candida krusei NCCPF 440022(MIC80=8µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis NCCPF 450033(MIC50=8µg/ml),Candida glabrata ATCC 90030(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida tropicalis ATCC 750(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida tropicalis ATCC 750(MIC=>64µg/ml),Candida auris IL-3331(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida auris IL-3331(MIC=>64µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=11.243±0.877µg/ml)
